SheetPosts.creator: flipworldit@gmail.com
SheetPosts.title: Custom date and time format strings

childrenPosts.creator: flipworldit@gmail.com
childrenPosts.title: short day name
childrenPosts.content: <formatspec>d<formatspec><description>The day of the month, from 1 through 31.</description><example>2009-06-01T13:45:30 -> 1<example>

childrenPosts.creator: flipworldit@gmail.com
childrenPosts.title: day is formatted with a leading zero
childrenPosts.content: <formatspec>dd<formatspec><description>The day of the month, from 1 through 31.</description><example>2009-06-01T13:45:30 -> 01<example>
